name: copilot-ld
description: Intelligent chat agent built GitHub Copilot and Linked Data
author: D. Olsson <hi@senzilla.io>

scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/web' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/copilot' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/agent' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/llm' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/vector' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/text' 'npm run dev -w @copilot-ld/history'
scripts.test: find packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test
scripts.test:watch: find packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test --watch
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run spellcheck
scripts.check:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format:fix
